title: Tape Measure

fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value: - Measure the distance between two players' roles. You will learn the difference between their roles.

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
- For the next day and night, you will gain the abilities and attributes of whichever role correlates to the difference. If for whatever reason that role doesn't exist, you get nothing.
- You can multitask your normal ability with whatever ability you gain from your first attribute.
- With the Necronomicon, you may perform a Powerful attack instead of using whichever ability you gained, and you learn the exact roles of both targets.
